attributes.action: Demand the immediate resignation of Dr Rowan Williams from the position of Archbishop of Canterbury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By endorsing the inclusion of certain elements of Sharia law within the British judicial system Dr Rowan Williams has brought disgrace to the position of Archbishop of Canterbury and as such he should be asked to resign with immediate effect.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
